where does the movie mothers day take place

To determine where the movie "Mother's Day" takes place, I need to consider the context of the film. "Mother's Day" is a romantic comedy that revolves around the lives of several women and their relationships with their mothers, as well as their own experiences as mothers. The film features various storylines that intersect during the lead-up to Mother's Day.

Answer: The movie "Mother's Day" takes place in Atlanta, Georgia.

anchoring.content:
You are a cognitive scientist, to answer the following question:
where does the movie mothers day take place
I will provide you with several retrieved passages:
Passages:
['In 1994, the movie "Serial Mom" was filmed in Ruxton at the Church of the Good Shepherd, on Boyce Avenue.\n', '"Mother" was filmed on location in and around the Sausalito, Greenbrae, and Tiburon areas, with additional shooting in San Francisco. The exterior of Beatrice\'s house and street was shot in Studio City.\n', 'Filming for "Mother Lode" took place primarily at Lake Lovely Water near Squamish, British Columbia, with most aerial scenes filmed along the Fraser River Valley. Additional photography took place near Vancouver, British Columbia.\n', '"Mother\'s Day" is the 287th episode of NBC\'s legal drama "Law & Order" and the tenth episode of the thirteenth season. The 45 minute episode was filmed in New York City.\n', 'The main filming location of "The Second Mother", shot in February 2014, was a mansion on Morumbi, an affluent neighborhood of São Paulo.\n', "Mother's Day () is a 1993 Austrian comedy film directed by Harald Sicheritz.\n", 'Mothers premiered at the Toronto Film Festival and had its European premiere in the Panorama section of the 61st Berlin International Film Festival.\n', 'The remake of "Mother\'s Day" is directed by Darren Lynn Bousman and produced by Brett Ratner. The remake was released at Fantastic Fest in September 2010 and in the United Kingdom in June 2011. The film received several pushbacks, but was released on DVD, and Blu-ray, March 8, 2012.\n', '"Mother\'s Day" was released domestically on April 29, 2016 by Open Road Films.\n', "Mother's Day is a 2016 American romantic comedy film directed by Garry Marshall and written by Marshall, Tom Hines, Lily Hollander, Anya Kochoff-Romano and Matt Walker. It features an ensemble cast, led by Jennifer Aniston, Kate Hudson, Shay Mitchell, Julia Roberts, Jason Sudeikis, Timothy Olyphant, Britt Robertson, Jack Whitehall, Héctor Elizondo, and Margo Martindale. Filming began on August 18, 2015, in Atlanta, Georgia. It was released in the United States on April 29, 2016 by Open Road Films and grossed $48 million worldwide.\n"]

In 1994, the movie "Serial Mom" was filmed in Ruxton at the Church of the Good Shepherd, on Boyce Avenue.
"Mother" was filmed on location in and around the Sausalito, Greenbrae, and Tiburon areas, with additional shooting in San Francisco. The exterior of Beatrice's house and street was shot in Studio City.
Filming for "Mother Lode" took place primarily at Lake Lovely Water near Squamish, British Columbia, with most aerial scenes filmed along the Fraser River Valley. Additional photography took place near Vancouver, British Columbia.
"Mother's Day" is the 287th episode of NBC's legal drama "Law & Order" and the tenth episode of the thirteenth season. The 45 minute episode was filmed in New York City.
The main filming location of "The Second Mother", shot in February 2014, was a mansion on Morumbi, an affluent neighborhood of São Paulo.
Mother's Day () is a 1993 Austrian comedy film directed by Harald Sicheritz.
Mothers premiered at the Toronto Film Festival and had its European premiere in the Panorama section of the 61st Berlin International Film Festival.
The remake of "Mother's Day" is directed by Darren Lynn Bousman and produced by Brett Ratner. The remake was released at Fantastic Fest in September 2010 and in the United Kingdom in June 2011. The film received several pushbacks, but was released on DVD, and Blu-ray, March 8, 2012.
"Mother's Day" was released domestically on April 29, 2016 by Open Road Films.
Mother's Day is a 2016 American romantic comedy film directed by Garry Marshall and written by Marshall, Tom Hines, Lily Hollander, Anya Kochoff-Romano and Matt Walker. It features an ensemble cast, led by Jennifer Aniston, Kate Hudson, Shay Mitchell, Julia Roberts, Jason Sudeikis, Timothy Olyphant, Britt Robertson, Jack Whitehall, Héctor Elizondo, and Margo Martindale. Filming began on August 18, 2015, in Atlanta, Georgia. It was released in the United States on April 29, 2016 by Open Road Films and grossed $48 million worldwide.
